text:
Just released an app, React SPA, Firebase lambdas, heavy use of HubDB, deployed on HubSpot complete with tracking. Lots of fun, even the tricky bits were enjoyable (specifically React Router compatibility with HubSpot). Sam is a companion for steroid-treated patients that tracks side effects and provides information for users based on their journal entries.

<https://comp.steroidsandme.com/>
really cool app man, love that you built this
